attributes.additional_details:
I AM CREATING THIS PETITION THAT TOGETHER WE CAN CHANGE THE WAY THE DPSI EXAMINATION WOULD BE TAKEN. INSTEAD OF SITTING THE EXAMINATION AT THE OPEN CENTRE IOL IN LONDON WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO TAKE A COURSE AT SCHOOLS OR CENTRES AND SIT THE EXAMINATION AT THE CENTRES WITH THEIR EXAMINERS AND THE EXAMINERS SHOUKLD BE REGULATED BY THE OFQUAL AND NOT JUST PAYIONG A LOT OF MONEY AND THE DO NOT KNOW IF THE SO CALLED EXAMINERS ARE ACTUALLY EXPERST IN THE AREA TO ASSESS US. ANYBODY THEY TRAIN CAN BE AN EXAMINER. WE NEED QUALIFIED AND EXPERT EXAMINERS. THE IOL DOES NOT PROVIDE THAT. THEY JUST WANT MONEY. THEY PRAISE THEMSELVES SAYING THAT DPSI IS A HIGH STANDAR EXAMIANTION AND IN THAIS CASE THE EXAMINERS MUST HAVE A HIGH STANDARD TOO.
THANK YOU
